description: Mixed media series exploring identity, mental illness, and addiction
medium: Medium format film photography, scratched/burned negatives, archival prints, artist book, video

artworks.title: Scratched Negative 1
artworks.description: Self-portrait with image physically scratched from the negative, representing self-destruction and identity loss.
artworks.medium: Medium format film, scratched negative, archival print
artworks.alt: Self-portrait photograph with scratched and damaged negative showing physical destruction as metaphor for psychological destruction
